title: Get RACING EVENT-has-prime-image Relationship
description:
* The ›has-prime-image‹ relationship for the selected RACING EVENT is returned when one exists. -> Status Code \`200\`
* The response contains the relationship ID, the relationship name and the relationship partner.
* An empty response is returned when the selected RACING EVENT has no ›has-prime-image‹ relationship. -> Status Code \`200\`
* Requests with invalid ID are rejected. This can happen when there exists no node with the given ID or it is not a RACING EVENT. -> Status Code \`404\`
